attributes.action: Put the navy in the channel, kier starmer admits it's a national security issue.
attributes.additional_details:
Patrol the channel with the navy and turn back any small boats that are crossing. Paid out £800m to the French which were conveniently recorded by the BBC puncturing a boat, absolute joke! 

The country cannot sustain paying out for these individuals, scrounging around for £1.5b from pensioners when we pay out billions for illegal immigrants in hotels. The over spending has to stop. 

The government has ignored all the calls to stop the boats and starmer clearly is not smashing the gangs...
attributes.background: Put the navy in the channel to stop the small boat crossings. They are not full of "women and children" in the words of Darren Jones but young fighting age men who do not hold the same values as British people. It is a national security issue that has to be resolved, it is NOT far right.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/730769
